patthana16.26:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:1.1_1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:1.1_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta pañhā.
patthana16.26:2.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā.
patthana16.26:3.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.26:4.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… vipāke cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Sabbattha ekavīsa.)
patthana16.26:5.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:5.1_1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:5.1_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.26:6.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.26:7.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.26:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
